lines.text: Ya ever seen a man with his insides hangin' out? Looks like little silver and blue snakes, all wiggling. Agggh! Pour me another drink.
I just rose up from hell, with my hair on fire!
Mister, I've only got a dab of cash on me.

[to himself]
Now we gonna get all the money Whiskey Man. We don't have to share it with nobody.
In one breath, you just named our town's sorriest and best.
When you brand, it's usual to earmark and geld.

[to Jonas]
My, my. They must have laid that iron to you half-a-dozen times.
I didn't have to tell you, Jessie.
Oh yes you did because you knew I'd find out. What you didn't have to do was steal his money, brand him, and turn him into an animal.
I thought he was a thief.
Jessie, I want you to be the first to know I'm going to find him and give him his money back.
And what about the brand? Will you just peel that off?
